titleStmt.title: Poems on most of the festivals of the church composed by the Right Honourable Roger, Earl of Orrery.
titleStmt.author: Orrery, Roger Boyle, Earl of, 1621-1679.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Henry Herringman at the Anchor in the Lower Walk of the New-Exchange,

notesStmt.note: Text printed in Cork, the prefatory matter in London. Cf. NUC pre-1956.
Reproduction of original in British Library.
